casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reginald Underwood FULLARD 309P15-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Reginald Fullard, for Fullard, Reginald Underwood.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of January 2019 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
